data.title: EXOR NVExecutive & Employee Information
data.meta_description: The executive section provides information on EXOR NV senior management, executives, CEO and key decision makers and their roles in the organization.
data.text:
Mr. Nithin Nohria has been the Chairman of the company since 2023. He also serves as the Executive Chairman of Thrive Capital, a NYC venture capital firm and as a Director with Anheuser-Busch InBev, Alsym, Bridgespan, Massachusetts General Brigham, and Rakuten Medical. Prior to this, he served as a Dean with Harvard Business School from 2010 to 2020.

Mr. John Elkann has been the Interim Chairman of the company since May 2023. He also serves as the Chief Executive Officer of Exor since 2020. Prior to this, he served as the Chairman of the company from 2020 to 2022.

Mr. Guido De Boer has been the Chief Financial Officer of the company since November 2022. Previously, he served as various Chief Financial Officer roles across the globe, and ultimately as Global Head of Corporate Development at Heineken. He started his professional career in investment banking in 1997.

Ms. Suzanne Heywood has been the Chief Operating Officer of the company since November 2022. She also served as the Chairman of CNH Industrial N.V. and Iveco Group. Prior to this, she served at McKinsey & Company in various senior positions including Senior Partner.

Mr. Noam Ohana is the Managing Director of Ventures of the company. Prior to this, he served as a Managing Partner of Conegliano Ventures. He also served as a Partner at BeaconLight Capital. He started his investment career in 2007 at Atticus Capital.
